languages.text: "Ты звучишь как фанатик, который просто мечтает умереть во славу чего-то грандиозного".

traits.locale_text: "Если не ради свободы, то за что ты сражаешься на самом деле? Что стоит твоей смерти?"

languages.text: "You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."
languages.original_text: "Ты звучишь как фанатик, который просто мечтает умереть во славу чего-то грандиозного".

traits.locale_text: "You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."
"Then what are you really fighting for? What is worth giving up your life?"
"You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."
"Then what are you really fighting for? What is worth forfeiting your life?"
"You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."
"You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."
"You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."
"You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."

languages.text: "Ihr klingt wie ein Fanatiker, der einfach nur im Namen von etwas Größerem sterben will."
languages.original_text: "You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr klingt wie ein Fanatiker, der einfach nur im Namen von etwas Größerem sterben will."

languages.text: «Hablas como un fanático cuyo único deseo es morir en nombre de algo más importante que él mismo».
languages.original_text: "You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."

traits.locale_text: «Hablas como un fanático cuyo único deseo es morir en nombre de algo más importante que él mismo».

languages.text: 「お前はまるで、身の程知らずなほどの虎の威を借りて死にたいと願う狂信者のようだな」
languages.original_text: "You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はまるで、身の程知らずなほどの虎の威を借りて死にたいと願う狂信者のようだな」

languages.text: “你说话的口气就像个狂热分子一样，不过是打着伟大的旗号，一心求死而已。”
languages.original_text: "You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."

traits.locale_text: “你说话的口气就像个狂热分子一样，不过是打着伟大的旗号，一心求死而已。”

languages.text: « Vous m'avez tout l'air d'un fanatique prêt à se sacrifier pour une cause supérieure. »
languages.original_text: "You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez tout l'air d'un fanatique prêt à se sacrifier pour une cause supérieure. »

languages.text: "Kendinden daha yüce bir şey uğruna ölmek isteyen fanatiğin teki gibi konuşuyorsun."
languages.original_text: "You sound like a fanatic who simply wishes to die in the name of something greater than himself."
